cakes.title: Candy cane buttercream cake
cakes.description: This impressive extra-deep buttercream cake has festive green and red touches and edible holly and candy canes. Choose from vanilla sponge, chocolate sponge, carrot cake, red velvet sponge or rich fruit cake.

cakes.title: Christmas tree stump with Swedish gnome
cakes.description: An edible festive gnome sits on this extra deep Christmas cake decorated as a tree trunk with ivy, snowflake and toadstool details. Available in vanilla or chocolate sponge.

cakes.title: Afternoon tea (floral tea set)
cakes.description: This delicious afternoon tea cake with floral vintage tiered cake-stand and tea set intricately hand-crafted by our expert Cake Decorators will make your occasion truly memorable

cakes.title: Down on the farm
cakes.description: This is the perfect cake for a fan of farming or farm animals, with a red tractor plus cute sheep, chicks and pigs wallowing in 'mud'.

cakes.title: Pastel party and drips with party treats (extra deep)
cakes.description: Wow, a child's dream cake for a party - extra deep, with pastel icing drips, covered in sweets and biscuits with starburst topper! Available in vanilla or chocolate sponge.

cakes.title: Batman's Batmobile cake
cakes.description: Amaze your child with this fantastic Batman themed cake with edible bat signal, city skyline and of course the Batmobile on top. Available in vanilla sponge, chocolate sponge, carrot cake, red velvet sponge or rich fruit cake.

cakes.title: Handbag and champagne
cakes.description: A cake handbag carrying a bottle of champagne! Ideal for a handbag fan's special occasion and available in vanilla or chocolate sponge.

cakes.title: My Little Pony rainbow and flowers
cakes.description: Colourful and joyous two-tier cake adorned in sugarcraft rainbows, flowers, butterflies and, of course, an adorable pink my little pony princess  - this will make your child's day!

cakes.title: Retro Christmas
cakes.description: This retro Christmas cake has beautifully hand-crafted sugarcraft decorations. It's an impressive cake for the festive period, available in vanilla or chocolate sponge, or rich fruit cake.

cakes.title: Christmas buttercream wreath
cakes.description: A beautiful buttercream wreath with red bow on top of a delicious Christmas cake, this will make an excellent centrepiece at your festive celebration.

cakes.title: Quality Christmas
cakes.description: A chocoholic Christmas cake with chocolate buttercream, chocolates and wrapped in a gold bow. This cake will help you have a quality Christmas.

cakes.title: Crappy Christmas
cakes.description: A cheeky cake which for many goes perfectly with 2020! An icing 'poo', Santa hat and face mask adorns your delicious Christmas cake, available in vanilla or chocolate sponge, or rich fruit cake.

cakes.title: Christmas drip cake - extra deep
cakes.description: An extra-deep cake with chocolate drips, buttercream rosettes and sugarcraft Christmas decorations, this will help your Christmas to feel truly special. Available in fresh vanilla or chocolate sponge.

cakes.title: Mr & Mrs
cakes.description: This striking monochrome 2-tiered stacked wedding cake will look and taste perfect on your very special day. Choose from our special range of delicious sponge and filling options.

cakes.title: Celebrate your love
cakes.description: With a beautifully hand-crafted marble-effect fondant covered extra deep base under an elegant ivory second tier, this wedding cake is simple, modern and impactful.

cakes.title: Country Wedding
cakes.description: A stunning 3-tiered stacked vanilla wedding cake frosted in vanilla buttercream with your choice of filling and decorated with exquisite hand-crafted sugar flowers.

cakes.title: The Cascade
cakes.description: A 3-tiered chocolate sponge wedding cake surrounded by Belgian chocolate cigarillos and chocolate flakes, topped with fresh seasonal fruits.

cakes.title: Chocolate Dream
cakes.description: This delicious 3-tiered chocolate sponge is covered in Belgian chocolate with malt balls and fresh flowers.
